title: Dear Friend
short_cast: Tovino Thomas, Darshana Rajendran, Basil Joseph, Arjun Radhakrishnan, Arjun Lal, Sanchana Natarajan
cast: Tovino Thomas, Darshana Rajendran, Basil Joseph, Arjun Radhakrishnan, Arjun Lal, Sanchana Natarajan
genre: Mysteries, Malayalam-Language Movies, Dramas, Independent Movies

desc: For a group of friends living together in Bengaluru, life is all about fun and laughter — until one of them inexplicably disappears from their lives.
